Posted By: Ed Woelfle
Email sent, thanks!

Posted By: Eric
Why not just post all of your cards for sale in one or two threads, instead of 6?  Just curious.

When you have the top 6 posts, you knock everyone else down the list and don't give them a fair shot at selling, trading, etc.  It's not proper B/S/T etiquette.

Posted By: Jeremy
Eric - There was no intent on my part to "knock" anyone down the posting trail. I think if you want to approach etiquette, you could have personally emailed me instead of posterizing your feelings. 

I can see it your way, but I can also see it my way, as I was sitting here on a Sunday afternoon scanning in lots, and selling them accordingly. 

If you are that torn up about it, just bump your lot your selling to the top.

Really, not a big deal either way... Best to you -

Posted By: Eric
Jeremy...you are right as well.  I apologize for calling you out.

Good luck with your sales.
